OpenSim.Services.Interfaces.IGridRegistrationUrlModule Interface Reference

This is the sub service of the IGridRegistrationService that is implemented by other modules so that they can be queried for URLs to return. More...

Inheritance diagram for OpenSim.Services.Interfaces.IGridRegistrationUrlModule:

List of all members.

void RemoveUrlForClient (string sessionID, string url, uint port)
 Removes the given region from the http server so that the URLs cannot be used anymore.

 Give the region all of the ports assigned for this module.
string UrlName [get]
 Name of the Url.

Detailed Description

This is the sub service of the IGridRegistrationService that is implemented by other modules so that they can be queried for URLs to return.
